title: Add Red Hat and CentOS 7+ NFS support
body:
This is related to issue #1139 which added support for Fedora 17+ since now EL7 uses systemd as well now.

On bringing up a vagrant guest, the nfs plugin tries to start the NFS service on the host using /etc/init.d/nfs and gives this error message:

```
==> web: Exporting NFS shared folders...
==> web: Preparing to edit /etc/exports. Administrator privileges will be required...
sudo: /etc/init.d/nfs: command not found
```
